data.text: @apark2453 I tried to calmly have this conversation with 2 real friends on Facebook (not just online acquaintances) and it ended with them calling me names and declaring victory. One later called and apologized the other I guess is just a dick now.
@apark2453 They know all that but they have to win the culture war that’s going on in their minds.
@apark2453 There are very few topics that this person doesn’t have an extremely certain, very idiotic opinion about.
@apark2453 Your message is both spot-on and better suited for a different electorate.

@apark2453 I think that's giving too much credit to fuel companies. "Supply and Demand" is a buzzword to suggest that prices are determined purely algorithmically when those are two of a huge number of factors in determining prices, including "We just kinda want more money."
@annateresa79 @apark2453 I feel I could have been more sarcastic though. It's not dripping.
@BluDogAnchorite @apark2453 Came here to say this, equally sarcastically 🙂

@BluDogAnchorite @apark2453 Schrodinger's economy: if it's doing poorly, it's the current guy's fault; if it's doing well, it's just carry over from the former guy. Because I BELIEVE that the current guy can't be doing well.
@apark2453 They haven't forgotten.  They're hoping the rest of us have.  Along with them fucking up the response to COVID in the first place.
